
```{r thisOne{{spID}}}

spID <- "{{spID}}"

```

### `r unique(dat$strCommonName[dat$Species == spID])`

#### Map

```{r map{{spID}}}

dat_sf |>
  dplyr::filter(Species == spID) |>
  dplyr::mutate(year = lubridate::year(Date)
                , year = factor(year)
                ) |>
tm_shape(bbox = sf::st_bbox(r_poly)) +
  tm_dots(col = "year"
          , palette = "plasma"
          ) +
  tm_shape(r_poly) +
  tm_borders(col = "yellow"
             , alpha = 0.2
             ) +
  tm_scale_bar()

```

#### Plot

```{r plot{{spID}}}

dat |>
  dplyr::filter(hab != "oh"
                , Species == spID
                ) |>
  dplyr::mutate(year = as.numeric(as.character(year))) |>
  dplyr::group_by(strCommonName, year) |>
  dplyr::summarise(n = sum(Count)) |>
  dplyr::ungroup() |>
  ggplot(aes(year, n)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  facet_wrap(~ strCommonName)

```
